vpn.title: VPN & Firewalls
vpn.desc: Corporate networks, school Wi-Fi, or active VPNs often block WebRTC traffic. Try disabling your VPN or switching to a mobile hotspot.

browser.title: Browser Compatibility
browser.desc: Chrome and Edge offer the best stability for WebRTC. Ensure your browser is up to date.

nat.title: NAT Type Issues
nat.desc: If both players are behind 'Symmetric NATs', a direct connection might fail. Switching networks usually fixes this.

refresh.title: The 'Classic' Refresh
refresh.desc: Sometimes PeerJS IDs get desynced. A quick refresh for both the host and guests is often the fastest fix.

tip.label: Pro Tip
tip.content: If you are stuck on 'Waiting for Host' indefinitely, ask the host to send a fresh invite link.
